name: Unity Domain

source.value: Ponyfinder: Races of Everglow Second Edition

content:
Deities @Compendium[ponyfinder-foundryvtt-module.ponyfinder-deities.Huntress]{Huntress}, @Compendium[ponyfinder-foundryvtt-module.ponyfinder-deities.Princess Luminace]{Princess Luminace}, @Compendium[ponyfinder-foundryvtt-module.ponyfinder-deities.Sun King]{Sun King}, @Compendium[ponyfinder-foundryvtt-module.ponyfinder-deities.Sun Queen]{Sun Queen}

Domain Spell @Compendium[ponyfinder-foundryvtt-module.ponyfinder-spells.In Concert]{In Concert}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[ponyfinder-foundryvtt-module.ponyfinder-spells.United We Stand]{United We Stand}

Understanding that teamwork is the most powerful force the world can know, you specialize in encouraging and living it.
